synonyms: kṣetra-jñaḥ—the word kṣetrajña; ātmā—the living entity; puruṣaḥ—the enjoyer; pradhānam—the chief; prakṛtiḥ—the material nature; striyām—in the feminine gender.
translation: " 'The word kṣetrajña refers to the living entity, the enjoyer, the chief and material nature.'

purport.content: This is a quotation from the Svarga-varga (7) of the Amara-kośa dictionary.
